title: Upper apartment near Downtown Detroit
posting_body: This beautiful second-floor two-bedroom, one-bath apartment is located in the heart of historic Hamtramck, Michigan (near main crossroads Gallagher and Evaline).
Minutes from freeways I-75 and I-94 and minutes from Downtown/Midtown Detroit, Wayne State University, and the University of Detroit Mercy.
The apartment is very close to local grocery stores and within walking distance of parks and downtown Hamtramck.
RENT DEPENDS ON THE NUMBER OF OCCUPANTS:
$715/month for one person (which does not include utilities, water split between occupants).
$800/month for two.
$1,000/month for three.
SECURITY DEPOSIT $1,072.50 for one, $1,200 for two, $1,500 for three.
Move-in costs-- first-month rent, plus security deposit, plus any prorates.
CREDIT REQUIREMENT: 690 or greater (FICO).
MINIMUM INCOME REQUIREMENT: $2,325 (individual and not combined income)
Each person will have to qualify separately.
No Cosigners.
Applications will not be accepted from sex offenders, those with evictions, judgments, criminal history, or bankruptcy.
No smoking of any kind is allowed.
No unauthorized persons.
One cat will be considered on a case-by-case basis (extra deposit required).
To schedule a showing please send the following:
FULL NAME(S)
TELEPHONE NUMBER(S) and EMAIL(S)
FICO SCORE(S) reflecting 690 or more
Last 3 months pay stubs and/or W2s
If you are interested in the unit after the showing, you will need to fill a rental application and then undergo a credit, background, and criminal check which will be $40 nonrefundable.
Serious inquiries only.
